duties_responsibilities.duty: Understand clinical research and clinical operations processes, including study start-up, site feasibility, site payments, monitoring, and study closeout.
Analyze business and user needs, document business requirements and process flows for system implementations and existing system changes.
Develop problem statements, business cases, and lead user group forums. Lead process design, system integration, and configuration workshops with the business team and software vendors.
Translate business requirements to functional requirements and configuration specifications in collaboration with software vendors.

Define system scope and objectives through an understanding of applicable business systems and industry requirements. Responsible for project documentation (URS, configuration specification, FRS, integration data flows, UAT scripts, etc.).

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Clinical Research, Healthcare Management, or related field (Master's preferred)
